Login_error_try_to_sign_up: Login error try to sign up
user_data_text: Please fill in all the fields, it won't take long. All data you fill in is stored in encrypted form and is not available to third parties. The data you enter is only needed for more accurate operation of the application and more correct advice.
steps_per_day_description: Indicate an approximate average number of steps per day
sports_per_week_description: Indicate the average time you spend on sports per week
